content.body: Kris Kowal: Looking at https://www.collectionsjs.com/, I’m wondering if you haven’t had any demand for LIFO or FIFO maps or sets. I wouldn’t use them myself in favor of LRU or LFU, but LIFO and FIFO are so simple that I’m wondering if anyone has asked for them.

content.body:
> <@jschoi:matrix.org> Kris Kowal: Looking at https://www.collectionsjs.com/, I’m wondering if you haven’t had any demand for LIFO or FIFO maps or sets. I wouldn’t use them myself in favor of LRU or LFU, but LIFO and FIFO are so simple that I’m wondering if anyone has asked for them.

I made some mistakes in the design of collections that precluded adoption, so I don’t have meaningful signal.

I made some mistakes in the design of collections that precluded adoption, so I don’t have meaningful signal.

content.body: That said, those mistakes are addressable and I’ve got a plan, but not time.

content.body: or maybe it's just that they are called a different thing

content.body: i have an interest in these things, but not as general purpose collections but as caches
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: i have an interest in these things, but not as general purpose collections but as caches

content.body: we have a lot of pressure, from my observations, of large and "expert" apps asking for GC hooking points and GC info to be exposed for the purpose of writing userland caches
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: we have a lot of pressure, from my observations, of large and "expert" apps asking for GC hooking points and GC info to be exposed for the purpose of writing userland caches

content.body: they might misguidedly use WeakRefs right now, which, with a "maybe clear on every GC", is a particularly bad cache eviction policy
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: they might misguidedly use WeakRefs right now, which, with a "maybe clear on every GC", is a particularly bad cache eviction policy

content.body: one realization the v8 team has had recently is well, maybe there's space for directly designing caches instead of exposing GC stuff, which seems blech
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: one realization the v8 team has had recently is well, maybe there's space for directly designing caches instead of exposing GC stuff, which seems blech

content.body: Well, the main purpose of https://github.com/js-choi/proposal-policy-map-set would be to act as caches, and so LIFOMap and FIFOMap are in it right now. Hopefully they would match what you’re looking for.
